mapper.select: SELECT opi.pay_no, opi.ord_no, opi.clm_no, opi.pay_mn_cd, opi.pay_ccd, opi.pay_prgs_scd, opi.pay_amt, opi.cncl_amt, opi.rfnd_avl_amt, opi.trsn_id, opi.org_pay_no, opi.vr_acct, opi.vr_acct_nm, opi.vr_bnk_cd, oob.rfnd_bnk_ck, oob.rfnd_acct_no, oob.rfnd_acct_own_nm FROM op_pay_info opi , op_ord_base oob WHERE opi.ord_no = oob.ord_no AND opi.ord_no = #{ordNo} AND opi.pay_prgs_scd IN ('10', '20');
